amendatorysection.catchline: Occupation tax; payment; decal; form; display.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The payment of the occupation tax imposed by the Mechanical Amusement Device Tax Act shall be evidenced by a separate decal for each mechanical amusement device signifying payment of the tax, in a form prescribed by the Tax Commissioner.
(2) Every distributor or operator shall place such decal in a conspicuous place on each mechanical amusement device to denote payment of the tax for each device for the current year.
